bill.title: Relating to provision of Social Security numbers to Department of State Police.
bill.description: Clarifies that certain agencies shall provide Social Security numbers to Department of State Police for purposes of identifying certain persons. Clarifies that certain agencies shall provide Social Security numbers to Department of State Police for purposes of identifying certain persons.
